refnamediv.refpurpose: Prints the current collection of presets for MIDI controllers.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Prints the current collection of presets for MIDI controllers in a format that can be used in an orchestra, to the console or a file.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: At initialisation time the existence of the internal data structure is checked.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Sfilename -- (optional) file to which to print. If omitted it uses the current output.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the ctrlprintpresets opcode. It uses the file ctrlreset.csd.
Example of the ctrlprintpresets opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
